title: Halloween skins out now?
body: So there are 3 new legacy skins out in the shop and all the old legacy halloween ones are back and theres no mention of it anywhere?

replies.body: There will definitely be something going up on our website a bit later.
Wait....all legacy ones are back??? including Mad Chemist {{champion:27}} ????
Riot plz why not Mad Chemist  ????. I've been waiting 3 years for that skin {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Ok awesome ^^ id hate for people who have been waiting for the legacy ones to miss their chance.
Can you put every skin that's being re-released :)
Because they're not out on other servers yet.
Ooooh baby, Here goes my wallet :(
